backup.created: Finished the creation of the backup {name}.
backup.deployed: Finished the deployment of the backup {name}.

move.failed_to_delete_archive: Failed deleting server transfer archive for {name}.
move.failed_to_update_allocation: Failed to free old allocation on {name}.
move.failed_final_stage: Failed final stage for server transfer (make sure old server got deleted from {name} and dbs moved host if not failed)

migrator.title: Migrator
migrator.exceeded_limits: Failed migration for {fqdn}: {message} Contact us for manual migration.
migrator.data_mismatch: Failed migration for {fqdn} due to data mismatch: {message}
migrator.failed_due_to_internal_error: Failed migration for {fqdn}: Something went wrong internally, please contact us through a support ticket.
